1.0.0.2: Email us at hello@afterparty.io to tell us how we did, and how we can do better!

1.0.1.1: Oops! iOS 7 phones no longer have problems running the app. Sorry about that one!

1.1.0.1: You asked, we listened. You can now edit events that you created while they're still in session! Even better, every user who's at that event already will now get a push notification that the event has changed!
1.1.0.2: If you don't see the place where you want to throw your event, you can add one real easily now!
1.1.0.3: Oh yeah, bug fixes, and all that jazz.
